Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Argh! That wretched Link! Not only did
he break into our branches, but he set all
our tailors free!
We'd only just kidnapped them too...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>It's the branches' duty to make our
uniforms. We've gotta fix this before
Master Kohga finds out.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Well, it shouldn't be too hard to nab those gaudy
seamsters again... They're always walking down
<clr:0000>roads<clr:ffff> without a care in the world.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, if it isn't Link!<sp:5:0:0> Huh...<sp:5:0:0> I guess it
actually ISN'T Link.

<snd:Ease>All right.<sp:5:0:0> Get inside.
Talk_200: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>What is it?<sp:5:1:0> Waitâ€”<sp:5:1:0> YOU!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>It's Link! <sp:5:1:0>Get ready for battle!<sp:1:3:4:5a000000>
Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's the branches' duty to make our
uniforms, so we have to get those tailors
back before Master Kohga finds out.
That blasted Link.<sp:5:0:0> We're busy enough
without having to rekidnap people!

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive>Listen, you. If you see anybody in flashy
clothes, you grab them and bring them
back here!
You can find them walking the<clr:0000> roads<clr:ffff>
outside. Tailors love roads.
Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's the branches' duty to make our
uniforms, so we have to get those tailors
back before Master Kohga finds out.
Though...<sp:5:1:0>I guess Master Kohga is gone...<sp:5:2:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:TalkPositive>That blasted Link!<sp:5:0:0> Could he make any
more trouble for us?!<sp:0:4:0>Listen, you. If you see anybody in flashy
clothes, you grab them and bring them
back here!<sp:0:4:0>You can find them walking the<clr:0000> roads<clr:ffff>

Talk_000_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Argh! That wretched Link! Not only did
he break into our branches, but he set
all our tailors free!
We'd only just kidnapped them too...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad>It's the branches' duty to make our
uniforms. We have to do something
before Master Kohga finds out.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Well, it shouldn't be too hard to nab those gaudy
seamsters again, at least... They're always walking
down <clr:0000>roads<clr:ffff> without a care in the world.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_001_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Outfit making is the branches' duty.
That's why we have to get our tailors
back before Master Kohga finds out!
That accursed Link! <sp:5:0:0>We're busy enough
without his meddling.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Blademaster, if you see anyone dressed
in flashy clothes, please let me know, and
I'll capture them.
You can often find them walking the<clr:0000> roads<clr:ffff>
outside. Tailors love roads.
Talk_002_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Outfit making is the branches' duty.

back before Master Kohga finds out!
Though...<sp:5:1:0>I suppose Master Kohga is gone.<sp:5:2:0><sp:0:4:0>That accursed Link! <sp:5:0:0>It's as if he lives to

I'll capture them.

outside. Tailors love roads.
